pattern: policy .* should (be reversed|be changed|be improved|be reconsidered|be strengthened)
policy .* (is failing|is inadequate|requires revision|needs immediate reform)
policy .* (has failed|has not been effective|is ineffective)
(there is|it is) an? (urgent|immediate|critical|essential|vital) need for .* policy.*
existing policy .* (is outdated|is insufficient|must be overhauled)
policy .* must align with (scientific|ethical|human rights) principles
government has a (duty|obligation) to implement policy changes
policies that (increase|worsen|exacerbate) inequalities must be reconsidered
this study underscores the (urgent|critical|pressing) need for policy changes
